title: Female federal judge's son shot dead, hubby in ICU after daylight attack AT HOME.
itunes:title: Female federal judge's son shot dead, hubby in ICU after daylight attack AT HOME.
description:
A man posing as a delivery person shoots and kills the son and husband of a New Jersey federal judge. Multiple shots are fired at the North Brunswick home Daniel Anderl, a 20-year-old student at Catholic University, was killed. Mark Anderl, the judge's husband is wounded. He is a was injured and is stable after surgery.

Joining Nancy Grace today:

  • Mark Eiglarsh, Criminal Defense Attorney, www.speaktomark.com 
  • Dr Angela Arnold - Psychiatrist, Atlanta Ga
  • Jeff Cortese - Former FBI Special Agent, 
  • Jennifer Shen, Forensic Pathologist, Former San Diego Police Department Crime Lab Director
  • Nicole Partin - Crime Online Investigative Reporter

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
